info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please check this subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DiaperedRoleplay/

Danielle (the reader) lives is a small town. It is time for her to start high school but there is only a primary school nearby. She has a few options, what she doesn't know is that whatever she chooses she will end up in diapers.

If you are adding to this story please keep it in the style of a "choose your own adventure" type book. That is keep the point of view 2nd person (The main character of the story (Danielle) is refered to as "You" - the reader) and limit options to choices Danielle can make, not events outside her control. Eg "Which door will you open? 1) The red door 2) The green door" is good but "What do you find behind the red door? 1) An over-sized nursery 2) The girls' locker room." is not.
